AutoVariable.label: Auto queue
AutoVariable.tooltip: Automatically starts casual queue.

AutoVariable.label: Auto requeue
AutoVariable.tooltip: Automatically requeues for another casual match.

AutoVariable.label: Auto join team
AutoVariable.tooltip: Automatically joins a team.

AutoVariable.label: Requeue if player remain
AutoVariable.tooltip: Requeues if this many player remains on a server.

AutoVariable.label: Abandon if bots remain
AutoVariable.tooltip: Abandons match if this amount of bots is on a server.

AutoVariable.label: Abandon if IPC remain
AutoVariable.tooltip: Abandons match if this many IPC client remains on a server.

AutoVariable.label: Abandon if humans remain
AutoVariable.tooltip: Abandons match if this humans? remains on a server.

AutoVariable.label: Abandon if players remain
AutoVariable.tooltip: Abandons match if this many players on a server.

AutoVariable.label: Abandon if team remain
AutoVariable.tooltip: Abandons match if this many team? on a server.

AutoVariable.label: Auto crouch
AutoVariable.tooltip: Automatically starts crouching.

AutoVariable.label: Always crouch
AutoVariable.tooltip: Always start crouching (Overrides Auto crouch).

AutoVariable.label: Mic spam
AutoVariable.tooltip: Enables spamming through voice chat.

AutoVariable.label: Mic spam interval off
AutoVariable.tooltip: When we should start mic spamming.

AutoVariable.label: Mic spam interval on
AutoVariable.tooltip: When we should stop mic spamming.

AutoVariable.label: Anti auto balance
AutoVariable.tooltip: Prevents this current player to be auto balanced to the opposite team.

AutoVariable.label: Auto disguise
AutoVariable.tooltip: Automatically disguise (Spy).

AutoVariable.label: No MOTD
AutoVariable.tooltip: Disables MOTD.

AutoVariable.label: Auto vote for current map
AutoVariable.tooltip: Automatically votes for current map (Casual only).

AutoVariable.label: Autovote yes
AutoVariable.tooltip: Automatically votes yes depending on target status.

AutoVariable.label: Autovote no
AutoVariable.tooltip: Automatically votes no depending on target status.

AutoVariable.label: Autovote wait
AutoVariable.tooltip: Wait before we will automatically vote.

AutoVariable.label: Wait min (ms)
AutoVariable.tooltip: Wait minimum in milliseconds.

AutoVariable.label: Wait max (ms)
AutoVariable.tooltip: Wait maximum in milliseconds.

AutoVariable.label: Kick RAGE status
AutoVariable.tooltip: Votes no on RAGE status player call votes.

AutoVariable.label: Abandon on local vote
AutoVariable.tooltip: Abandon matchmaking server after calling vote.

AutoVariable.label: Requeue on kick
AutoVariable.tooltip: Requeue if getting kicked. Note: Queue will stop if vote fails.

AutoVariable.label: Votekick Timer
AutoVariable.tooltip: Votekick Timer.

AutoVariable.label: Rage Only
AutoVariable.tooltip: Only call a vote kick on RAGE status player.

AutoVariable.label: Prioritize Rage
AutoVariable.tooltip: Prioritizes RAGE status players.

AutoVariable.label: Prioritize Previous
AutoVariable.tooltip: Prioritizes Previous ? players.

AutoVariable.label: Prioritize Score
AutoVariable.tooltip: Prioritizes players with this amount of score.
